title: Battery Holder
readmeContent:
# Battery Holder

## Parâmetros Configuráveis
| Parâmetro | Tipo | Padrão | Descrição |
|-----------|------|--------|-----------|
| numCells | number | 2 | Number of Battery Cells |
| tolerance | number | 0.4 | Tolerance (mm) - Clearance for easy fit |
| baseThickness | number | 3 | Base Thickness (mm) |
| wallThickness | number | 2.5 | Wall Thickness (mm) |

[Download STL](../../dist/battery-holder.stl)

title: Demo Box
description: Demo Box - Parametric Container with Lid
readmeContent:
# Demo Box

## Parâmetros Configuráveis
| Parâmetro | Tipo | Padrão | Descrição |
|-----------|------|--------|-----------|
| width | number | 50 | Box Width (mm) |
| depth | number | 50 | Box Depth (mm) |
| height | number | 30 | Box Height (mm) |
| wallThickness | number | 2 | Wall Thickness (mm) |
| cornerRadius | number | 3 | Corner Radius (mm) |

[Download STL](../../dist/demo-box.stl)
